description: Try our easy to follow Spiced "Vedges" recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Chips & fries,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Winter,Sesame free,Potato,Halal,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Sweet potato,Vegan,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Spiced "Vedges" Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 220Â°C. Line a baking tray with baking paper.

Cut vegetables into similar sized wedges. Combine oil, paprika, chilli and lemon rind in a bowl. Add vegetables and toss to coat. Transfer to the tray in a single layer. Sprinkle with sea salt flakes.
Bake, turning every 15 minutes, for 45 minutes or until evenly brown. Serve hot with a dip of your choice.
